org.amcgala.framework.shape

Class AbstractShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.amcgala.framework.shape.AbstractShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable, Renderable, Shape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Box, Circle, Circle, CompositeShape, Letter, Line, Mesh, Particle, ParticleEmitter, ParticleGravitation, Point2d, Polygon, Rectangle, Sprite, Text, Triangle

    public abstract class AbstractShape
extends Object
implements Shape
    Diese Klasse stellt die Oberklasse aller darstellbaren Objekte dar.
    Author:
    Robert Giacinto
